subject: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Dear Beneficiary,
Greetings to you there, I'm Mr. John F Woods Vice Chairman and Chief
Financial it is my pleasure to announce to you that your compensation
fund has been deposited here by Mr. Antonio Guterres the
Secretary-General United Nations ''UN'' and we have been nominated to
carry out the funds to you.
It's stated that you will receive the sum of 7.5 million USD which is
assigned to be paid out to you via Western Union Money Transfer and
you are expected to provide your information for the release of funds
meanwhile i am looking forward to have your full information which is
to help us process and proceeded immediately.
Your full  Name.........
Phone Number........
Email............
Address ........
Id card
.........
Sincerely Yours,
Mr. John F Woods Vice Chairman
Email...file07143@gmail.com

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Mr. John Woods,

I'm delighted to hear from you and the news about the fund deposit is quite surprising! I must say, it's not every day that one receives such an unexpected message.

Could you please provide me with more details about this? How did Mr. Antonio Guterres come to choose me for this? And why is the United Nations involved in transferring funds via Western Union?

I'm also curious about the process of releasing these funds. Could you explain it a bit more? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Clifford
